variables.name: vfiw_admin_password
variables.description: String: Admin password of the new VM

variables.name: vfiw_image_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: Resource group that contains the incoming image.

variables.name: vfiw_image_base_name
variables.description: String: Name of the incoming image.

variables.name: vfiw_create_pip
variables.description: Boolean: Create a public ip for the VM or not.

variables.name: vfiw_install_omsagent
variables.description: Boolean: Install the log analytics oms agent in the new VM.
